moves.1. c4: English opening. I'm starting to use this opening in my last games.
moves.1... c5 2. Nc3 g6 3. Nf3: Black doesn't follow the main line...
moves.15... f5 16. Bf3 a6 17. d6: d6! b7 is in danger, but above all I threaten Qe7#.
moves.18. Bxc6+ Kf8: he can capture with b:c6 but it's followed by Qe7#, so he plays Kf8
moves.19. Qxe7+ Kg8 20. Bd5#: Bd5#. I know this is a short game but i'd like to know your impressions on my opening. Thank u for reading....waiting for nuntar and ruachessnut2 comments. Bye!
